SymbolDef.descr: SimProp gauge property, type and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: Axis
PropertyDef.descr: Location of axis when rotation applied

PropertyDef.name: SizeScale
PropertyDef.descr: X,Y scaling

PropertyDef.name: Script
PropertyDef.descr: The actual script to be used

PropertyDef.name: Maximum
PropertyDef.descr: The maximum value at which to cap the result of an expression

PropertyDef.name: Minimum
PropertyDef.descr: The minimum value at which to cap the result of an expression

PropertyDef.name: ExpressionResult
PropertyDef.descr: The result of an expression to compare against. Used in Case property-sets

PropertyDef.name: EndAngle
PropertyDef.descr: End angle for arc or pie (in degrees)

PropertyDef.name: LineWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Width of line in pixels. Applies to shapes.

PropertyDef.name: Transparency
PropertyDef.descr: Value between 0 and 1 to use for alpha-blending

PropertyDef.name: Radius
PropertyDef.descr: Radius to apply to shape (circle, pie, arc)

PropertyDef.name: StartAngle
PropertyDef.descr: Start angle for arc or pie (in degrees)

PropertyDef.name: StartAngleScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for start angle for arc or pie (in degrees)

PropertyDef.name: EndAngleScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for end angle for arc or pie (in degrees)

PropertyDef.name: Width
PropertyDef.descr: Width in pixels

PropertyDef.name: Height
PropertyDef.descr: Height in pixels

PropertyDef.name: Alpha
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not the image should be interpreted as having an alpha channel.

PropertyDef.name: Bright
PropertyDef.descr: If TRUE, the gauge will NOT be tinted or darkened at night.

PropertyDef.name: Bilinear
PropertyDef.descr: If TRUE, a bilinear filter will be applied to smooth edges.

PropertyDef.name: DegreesPointsTo
PropertyDef.descr: The starting value for a rotation

PropertyDef.name: PointsTo
PropertyDef.descr: The starting value for a rotation

PropertyDef.name: Name
PropertyDef.descr: Filename for image

PropertyDef.name: File
PropertyDef.descr: Filename to include

PropertyDef.name: ArtDirectory
PropertyDef.descr: Directory where art for this gauge is located

PropertyDef.name: HorizontalAlign
PropertyDef.descr: Align text with the left edge, center, or right of the specified box

PropertyDef.name: FontColorScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for foreground color for gauge text. Enclose strings in single quotes. e.g. 'Blue'

PropertyDef.name: FontFaceLocalize
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not to look for a localized font (one which contains all of the characters required for the current language

PropertyDef.name: BackgroundColor
PropertyDef.descr: Background color for gauge text. Use hex value (e.g. 0xFF00FF) or string (e.g. magenta) for color name

PropertyDef.name: BackgroundColorScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for background color for gauge text. Enclose strings in single quotes. e.g. 'Blue'

PropertyDef.name: LineColor
PropertyDef.descr: Line color for shapes - hex value or string. Do not need to enclose strings in single quotes.

PropertyDef.name: LineColorScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for line color for shapes. Enclose strings in single quotes. e.g. 'Blue'

PropertyDef.name: FillColor
PropertyDef.descr: Fill color for shapes. Do not need to enclose strings in single quotes.

PropertyDef.name: FillColorScript
PropertyDef.descr: Expression for fill color for shapes. Enclose strings in single quotes. e.g. 'Blue'

PropertyDef.name: DelayValue
PropertyDef.descr: How much to slow down the motion of the gauge element in the specified uints

PropertyDef.name: WrapMin
PropertyDef.descr: The minimum value associated with a shift

PropertyDef.name: WrapMax
PropertyDef.descr: The maximum value associated with a shift

PropertyDef.name: Visibility
PropertyDef.descr: An expression (which should evaluate to TRUE or FALSE to control the visibility of the element

PropertyDef.name: Fail_Key
PropertyDef.descr: The failure to trigger the associated action

PropertyDef.name: Length
PropertyDef.descr: Max number of characters in string to display. Leaving this property blank imposes no limit on the string length.

PropertyDef.name: GaugeString
PropertyDef.descr: The actual text to display

PropertyDef.name: Tabs
PropertyDef.descr: Defines the tab settings. For example: 15L, 100C, 180R

PropertyDef.name: VerticalAlign
PropertyDef.descr: Top, center, or bottom. DOES NOT WORK

PropertyDef.name: ClickType
PropertyDef.descr: Example: LeftSingle+LeftDrag

PropertyDef.name: MouseWheelFlip
PropertyDef.descr: Have the event/script associated with the 2nd mouserect be associated with the wheel-up instead of wheel-down.

PropertyDef.name: ClickRepeat
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not to repeat the mouse click when the user holds down the mouse button.

PropertyDef.name: HelpId
PropertyDef.descr: Static text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area.
PropertyDef.devnote: Reference the Tooltip Text document in the SDK for a complete list

PropertyDef.name: EnglishId
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area when user has english units selected.
PropertyDef.devnote: Reference the Tooltip Text document in the SDK for a complete list

PropertyDef.name: DefaultId
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area.
PropertyDef.devnote: Reference the Tooltip Text document in the SDK for a complete list

PropertyDef.name: MetricId
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area when the user has metric units selected.
PropertyDef.devnote: Reference the Tooltip Text document in the SDK for a complete list

PropertyDef.name: DefaultScript
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area if Metric and English tooltips haven't been defined.

PropertyDef.name: MetricScript
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area when the user has metric units selected.

PropertyDef.name: EnglishScript
PropertyDef.descr: Dynamic text to be displayed when user places mouse cursor in this area when the user has English units selected.

PropertyDef.name: Value
PropertyDef.descr: Text value for customdraw param.

PropertyDef.name: MacroValue
PropertyDef.descr: Text value for Macro propset. Wherever the macro is used in script, it will be replaced by this value.

PropertyDef.name: HeightScript
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate at load-time to specify height. Use instead of size.

PropertyDef.name: WidthScript
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate at load-time to specify width. Use instead of size.

PropertyDef.name: LeftScript
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate at load-time to specify X position. Use instead of FloatPosition.

PropertyDef.name: TopScript
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate at load-time to specify Y position. Use instead of FloatPosition.

PropertyDef.name: FontHeightScript
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate at load-time to specify FontHeight. Use instead of FontHeight.

PropertyDef.name: ScrollY
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate to determine how much the text should be scrolled.

PropertyDef.name: BlinkCode
PropertyDef.descr: Script to evaluate to determine how text should blink.

PropertyDef.name: Frequency
PropertyDef.descr: How often update should be processed.

PropertyDef.name: Update_When_Hidden
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not gauge should be updated when not visible.
